price: ߊߟߊ߫ ߞߊ߬ ߛߊ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߘߎ߱ ߘߊ߲߫ ߕߎ߬ߢߊ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߟߊ߫، ߊ߬ ߞߘߐߕߊ߬ߣߍ߲߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߜߙߊ߬ߢߐ߲߮ ߠߎ߫ ߡߊ߬
arabic: خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ بِٱلۡحَقِّۚ تَعَٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: khalaqa al-samāwāti wal-arḍa bil-ḥaqi taʿālā ʿammā yush'rikūna
